name: Grimlock Technical
description: The Grimlock Technical is a Medium humanoid that excels in stealth and subterfuge, often camouflaging into rocky terrains.
memorable: Its clever tactics, use of camouflage, and ability to deal mixed bludgeoning and lightning damage make it stand out.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting foes and control the battlefield.
relations: Typically operates alone or in small groups, possibly alongside other Grimlock or similar stealthy creatures.
environment: Rocky terrains, where it can effectively use camouflage to surprise its enemies.
strengths: Excellent stealth capabilities and versatility in combat options, including the ability to deal both melee and ranged damage.
weaknesses: Low hit points and poor Charisma, making it susceptible to social interactions and overt combat.
attacks: Uses a Lightning Stick for mixed damage, a grappling attack, a sling for ranged attacks, and a powerful silenced blunderbuss for piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Smoke Bomb can obscure the battlefield, facilitating ambushes or retreats.
senses: Blindsight at 30 ft., or 10 ft. while deafened, and passive Perception of 14, allowing it to detect hidden foes.
skills: Proficient in athletics, engineering, and stealth, giving it an advantage in physical endeavors.
additional_information: Has advantage on Stealth checks in rocky terrain due to Camouflage.
Advantage on Perception checks relying on hearing or smell with Keen Hearing and Smell.
Capable of grappling foes and controlling the fight with Throttle ability.
Uses a combination of melee and ranged attacks effectively.
Blinded condition immunity enhances its survivability.
test_queries: stealthy ambush predator in rocky terrain
humanoid with bludgeoning and lightning attacks
cunning creature that uses smoke bombs
Grimlock with keen senses and camouflage
